definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: I'm very suspicious that actually Archimedes had been thinking about that problem for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 我猜測，阿基米德實際上已經就此思考了很長時間。

sentences.english: Scholars suspect the story of Archimedes isn't even entirely true.
sentences.chinese: 學者們懷疑，阿基米德的故事可能出於杜撰。

sentences.english: The least square method for linear equations over non-archimedean local fields is established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了非阿基米德局部域上的最小二乘法。

sentences.english: The principle of this method is to use Archimedes spiral to approaching ellipse .
sentences.chinese: 該方法的實質是用阿基米德螺旋線去逼近離散橢圓。

sentences.english: Three of Archimedes' extant works are devoted to plane geometry.
sentences.chinese: 阿基米德現存的三部著作都是獻給平面幾何的。

sentences.english: Archimedes , a great physicist , discovered the principle of floating bodies .
sentences.chinese: 阿基米德，一位偉大的物理學家，發現了浮體原理。

sentences.english: As Archimedes settled himself in the bathtub the level of the water rose, of course.
sentences.chinese: 當阿基米德坐進澡盆時，水位當然就上升。

sentences.english: The method for the design of the Archimede's spiral cam feeding maehanism is given out.
sentences.chinese: 給出設計阿基米德螺線凸輪進給機構的方法。

sentences.english: Archimedes had his eureka moment in the bath.
sentences.chinese: 阿基米德在泡澡時靈感迸發。

sentences.english: He was heavily influenced by Greek philosophy and a great admirer of Archimedes.
sentences.chinese: 他深受古希臘哲學的影響，他是阿基米德的追隨者。

sentences.english: It is also known as Archimedes’ constant.
sentences.chinese: 它也被命名爲阿基米德常數。

sentences.english: Hydrometers is based on the Archimedes Law.
sentences.chinese: 浮計的原理是以阿基米德定律爲根據的。

sentences.english: But that time, Archimedes just at his laboratory inside painting his sketch.
sentences.chinese: 可是那時，阿基米德正在他的實驗室裏畫他的圖形。

sentences.english: We will need to consider about what Archimedes had done before he took the bath.
sentences.chinese: 我們將需要思考阿基米德在他洗澡之前做了什麼。

sentences.english: Do you remember the example of Archimedes in the bath?
sentences.chinese: 你還記得阿基米德在洗澡的例子嗎？

definition: Newton (name)/Sir Isaac Newton (1642-1727), British mathematician and physicist
Syracuse, Sicily/also written 錫拉庫薩|锡拉库萨[Xi1 la1 ku4 sa4]
Socrates (469-399 BC), Greek philosopher/José Sócrates (1957-), prime minister of Portugal (2005-2011)
Mikolaj Kopernik or Nicolaus Copernicus (1473-1543), Polish astronomer, mathematician and polymath
Sir Isaac Newton (1642-1727), British mathematician and physicist
variant of 費瑪|费玛[Fei4 ma3]
Euclid of Alexandria (c. 300 BC), Greek geometer and author of Elements 幾何原本|几何原本
